name: Borbins of the Alabaster Mist
description: After losing many family members to decay and frailty within the Moribund Mists, those of the Borbins of the Alabaster Mist who made it out are strong. And certainly stronger than they look. They're also renowned for their ability to nullify magic, and travel unseen even amidst extraordinary mages. Now biding their time as healers in nearby villages, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
